About Property:
About 783 Tremont St Boston, MA 02118
SOUTH END NEWER CONSTRUCTION| NO BROKER FEE --

These loft-style units are situated on the coveted Tremont Street. Live amongst the art galleries, musical gatherings, cafes, restaurants, shopping and more! These 1 and 2 bed units contain stainless steel appliances, high ceilings, stained floors, large windows, exposed brick, and great views of the courtyard. Almost all utilities are covered by the building, residents cover electricity + Cable/WiFi. Residents have access to the indoor pool, fitness center, seating areas, gas grilles, a zen garden and bocce court. Building is pet friendly. Bike storage available. Parking available for additional monthly cost.

**Photos are of similar staged model.
